locations: Spurn Point, East Riding of Yorkshire, England, UK::(RNLI)
imdb.plot outline: The Humber RNLI Lifeboat Station Is the UK's only full time coastal station. We follow the RNLI crew for a day to see what the job involves and to find out about life at Spurn point. We speak to all members of the five man crew and find out what their job entails, both on the lifeboat and back on shore. There are checks to be made and equipment to maintain.
imdb.title: Access All Areas: RNLI Humber Lifeboat Crew, Spurn Point
akas: Access All Areas: RNLI Humber Lifeboat Crew, Spurn Point (United Kingdom)
plot: Behind the scenes with the RNLI crew at the Humber lifeboat station.::James Smart

The Humber RNLI Lifeboat Station Is the UK's only full time coastal station. We follow the RNLI crew for a day to see what the job involves and to find out about life at Spurn point. We speak to all members of the five man crew and find out what their job entails, both on the lifeboat and back on shore. There are checks to be made and equipment to maintain.::James Smart
